                                      String script)
        Parameters:
        host - Hostname.
        port - Port number.
        uname - Username.
        passwd - Password (can be null if private key authentication is used).
        key - Private key file path.
        nodes - Number of nodes to start.
        igniteHome - Ignite installation folder.
        cfg - Configuration path.
        script - Script path.

        nodes - Number of nodes to start.
        igniteHome - Ignite installation folder.
        cfg - Configuration path.
        script - Script path.
        logger - Custom logger.
